package.name: ebay2magento
package.summary: This is ebay to magento item import extension
package.description:
Overview This extension can be used for item import from ebay to magento. This extension is very user-friendly form item import from ebay2magento User can import all ebay products within a 2 simple steps.
Features
All eBay items import into your magento store by ebay category. User can import item two ways : - Item import by itemID - Item import by sellerID Its inserts and display automatically to your magento store easily. It is user friendly and easily to understand and can easily work with it.
Installation / Configuration 1) Install from magentoconnect using key. After installation logout from admin panel and then after login again. 2) Than Goto System->Configuration->ebay Account Setting from left side you can see two text box first is ‘ebay Site Global Id’ (Enter Your Site Id eg: EBAY-US, EBAY-IE,EBAY-UK) and second is ‘ebay Application Name’ (Enter your ebay app id eg:example-9d17-4093-891a-31b626957 41d) and than save it. 3) Goto Ebay->Import items 4) Select the category of product you want to import. 5) There are two ways to import product in magento either by store Seller Id or by ebay Product Id Note : Product import by Seller Id will import all products of the store. Note : Product import by eBay Product Id will import only one product whose id you will input in the textbox. 6) Import Product either by Seller Id or by Item Id 7) After Successfull Import of Products from step one than Import Product Detais of imported products. This will import product Description, multiples images, quantity.
package.notes: Updated version of ebay2mganto item import
